Originality Matches.description: Both proposals include initial remote sensing surveys using multispectral sensors.
Originality Matches.proposal_1_section: Drone-based multispectral scanning of coal seams
Originality Matches.proposal_2_section: Swarm multispectral sensing using synchronized drones

Originality Matches.description: Each includes a centralized data analysis platform that integrates environmental and geological datasets.
Originality Matches.proposal_1_section: Integrated analytics cloud for terrain + thermal data
Originality Matches.proposal_2_section: Swarm Data Hub for environmental and geological fusion

Originality Matches.description: Both employ automated mapping through AI-driven interpretation.
Originality Matches.proposal_2_section: AI-assisted swarm reconstruction of terrain layers

Application Novelty Matches.proposal_1_approach: Thermal anomaly detection via aerial sensors

Technical Novelty Matches.proposal_1_problem_solved: Identifying coal outcrops from aerial images
Technical Novelty Matches.proposal_2_problem_solved: Coordinating swarm avoidance and environmental detection

Technical Novelty Matches.proposal_1_problem_solved: Generating 3D terrain maps for exploration planning
Technical Novelty Matches.proposal_2_problem_solved: Synchronizing distributed LiDAR inputs across swarms
